overview: Max film Bellokko “Ejacula, la vampira” based on “Dracula” by Bram Stoker can cause not only nostalgia specific sense of humor, in the 1990s already outgoing, and from modern mainstream completely eroded, but the legendary cast: in it starred the now legendary figures of Italian and French industry – itself Bellokko (aka Alessandro del Mar), Rocco Siffredi, Patricia Kennedy, Ron Jeremy.
title: Ejacula, la vampira
